actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to assist certain totally and permanently disabled individuals in acquiring housing units.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants in amounts not exceeding $10,000 with specified limitations to assist totally and permanently disabled individuals in acquiring housing units. Sets forth factors to be considered in determining eligibility for such grants.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to assist certain totally and permanently disabled individuals in acquiring housing units.
